casebody.data:
Berry vs. Griffith. June, 1827. The Court of Appeals will not grant a rule on an appellant who has remov.. ed out of the state since the appeal, to give security for the costs of suit. Aureal from Montgomery County Court. .- F. S. Key, for the Appellee,

moved the court for a rule on the appellant to give security for the costs — The appellant having, since the appeal in this case, removed out of the state, into the District of Columbia. He filed an affidavit, proving the fact of such removal.

RULE REFUSED.
